name: Glen Moich Motor Club - Winston Creek Map
name_original: Glen Moich Motor Club - Winston Creek Map
description:
Glen Moich Motor Club is a beat the clock off road racing game.  You simply have to drive into the chequered box at the end of the track, before the music finishes, to complete the stage. This is one of the maps which are being developed. 

Use the arrow or ASDW keys to move the vehicle. If you get stuck in a rut, or on your side / roof, press R to restart the level. To exit the game press Esc.

I hope you enjoy this map. Please download all of them 😊 Also, leave feedback to help me make it better :)

If you like the music, you can get your hands on it here;

https://soundcloud.com/scott-mason-beats/sets/glen-moich-motor-club-soundtrack

You Rock!
